page.description: Specify the minimum build of Alpha Anywhere required to edit this component.

discussion.p: If a developer tries to edit the component using a build that is older than the specified minimum build, a warning will be displayed. The user will not, however, be prevented from editing the component.

page.tip: The Build number can be found listed after the version number in the *[ui:About Alpha Anywhere...]* dialog. The About dialog can be accessed under the *[ui:Help]* menu in the Alpha Anywhere IDE.
